The passing of Zubeen Garg is a terrible tragedy. His voice defined a generation, and his talent was truly unmatched.

He overcame personal tragedies to reshape the landscape of Assamese music. His perseverance and courage have left an enduring mark.

He will live on in our hearts and minds forever.

36 सेकंड में 2 वोटर मिटाओ, 
फिर सो जाओ - ऐसे भी हुई वोट चोरी!

आपका बहुत-बहुत धन्यवाद  

: 
@RahulGandhi
 जी
Two Faces

Meeting many of the survivors of the Chooralmala and Mundakkai landslide brought home the immense suffering they are still facing. 

We discussed each different issue in depth, they requested me to visit the site once more so we went there the next day and took stock, then along with some of their representatives, I met the DC and we went through all pending matters one by one. 

I am happy that some of the matters are resolvable and with the UDF organisation and the district authorities we should be able to show some progress regarding these in the near future. Others will need more time and policy interventions which I will take up with the concerned ministries and raise in parliament. 

No effort, no matter how well meaning, can give back what has been lost, but together we can try our best to make life more liveable for those who have borne so much pain.

My thoughts and prayers are with the family, fans and people of Assam as they mourn the loss of Zubeen Garg, a musical icon.

His melodies will forever echo in our hearts.

Visiting the Cholanaikkar  unnathi yesterday taught me so much…their traditions and beliefs are more progressive than many of our own. 

Living in harmony with nature, respecting each other and abiding by egalitarian social rules in which men and women are equal decision makers is their way of life. 

We also discussed the many problems they are facing and met the forest and administrative authorities with them so that we could help find some solutions.

कर्नाटक की आलंद विधानसभा में बड़े पैमाने पर वोटर्स का नाम काटने की कोशिश की गई। हमारे प्रत्याशी की शिकायत पर चुनाव आयोग के स्थानीय अधिकारी ने FIR दर्ज कराई थी। 

जब चुनाव आयोग खुद मान चुका है कि गड़बड़ी हो रही थी, उनके अधिकारी ने ही FIR दर्ज कराई तो जांच क्यों रोकी जा रही है? 

कर्नाटक CID ने 18 महीने में 18 पत्र लिखे लेकिन चुनाव आयोग ने कोई सबूत मुहैया क्यों नहीं कराए? 

CID को जांच के लिए IP एड्रेस, डिवाइस पोर्ट्स, OTP वगैरह की डिटेल क्यों नहीं दी जा रही है? 

चुनाव आयोग जांच को बाधित करके किसे और क्यों बचाना चाहता है?

Aland, Karnataka

Investigation reveals: 6,018 applications impersonating voters were auto-filed using software and mobile numbers from outside Karnataka. These deletions specifically targeted Congress voters and booths where the party was winning.

: LoP Shri 
@RahulGandhi

Visited the proposed Padinjarathara–Poozhithodu road site at Kottiyamvayal, along with the District Collector, District Forest Officer and PWD Executive Engineers.

This new road would make a big difference by providing an alternate route for the Thamarassery ghat road, which would improve the connectivity of the Wayanad district.

 Wayanad, Kerala
